sentences.en: But she recovered her equanimity by the time they had travelled a dozen miles.
sentences.cn: 不过他们走了十二英里以后,她又恢复了平静.

sentences.en: Edward was a model of good temper and his equanimity imperturbable.
sentences.cn: 爱德华是个典型的好性子,他总是沉着镇定.

sentences.en: He didn't care , for experience hard taught him to take and lose jobs with equanimity.
sentences.cn: 算计着, 大概新女仆来到就是他该卷铺盖的时候了.

sentences.en: He received the news with surprising equanimity.
sentences.cn: 他得到消息时显得异常镇静。

sentences.en: He should be fearless , bear his unluctable fate with equanimity.
sentences.cn: 人应当无所畏惧, 对不可避免的命运安之若泰.

sentences.en: His sense of humour allowed him to face adversaries with equanimity..
sentences.cn: .他的幽默感让他能够平静地面对对手。

sentences.en: How slight a thing will disturb the equanimity of our frail minds!
sentences.cn: 要搅乱我们脆弱的心灵的安宁真是太容易了!

sentences.en: Lynde took his loss with equanimity.
sentences.cn: 林德对于输钱,处之泰然.

sentences.en: Mr. Pickwick's equanimity was at once restored.
sentences.cn: 匹克威克先生的镇静马上恢复了.

sentences.en: She accepted the prospect of her operation with equanimity .
sentences.cn: 她心情平静地接受了动手术的可能性。

sentences.en: She maintained her equanimity throughout her long ordeal.
sentences.cn: 她在长期的苦难中心情一直都很平静.

sentences.en: She recovered her equanimity, and was an agreeable image of serene dignity.
sentences.cn: 她恢复了平静, 显得安祥端庄、神采奕奕.

sentences.en: She was sure his equanimity was fictitious.
sentences.cn: 她确信他的镇定是佯装的.

sentences.en: She went again, and in so doing temporarily recovered her equanimity.
sentences.cn: 她又去看了戏, 而且这样一来又暂时恢复了她的平静.

sentences.en: The defeat was taken with equanimity by the leadership.
sentences.cn: 领导层坦然地接受了失败。

sentences.en: The minister received the bad news with surprising equanimity.
sentences.cn: 部长听到这个坏消息时,镇定得令人吃惊.

trans.tran_en: calmness in the way that you react to things, which means that you do not become upset or annoyed
